Class LoggerConfiguration

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.boot.logging.LoggerConfiguration
public final class LoggerConfiguration extends Object
Immutable class that represents the configuration of a LoggingSystem's logger.
Since:
1.5.0
Author:
Ben Hale, Phillip Webb

    Logger level configuration.

    • getLevelConfiguration

      public @Nullable LoggerConfiguration.LevelConfiguration getLevelConfiguration(LoggerConfiguration.ConfigurationScope scope)
      Return the level configuration for the given scope.
      Parameters:
      scope - the configuration scope
      Returns:
      the level configuration or null for direct scope results without applied configuration

      2.7.13
